data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Baser, Birol, Firat, Mehmet, Aziret, Akin (2016): The pollen morphology of Pelargoniumendlicherianum and Pelargoniumquercetorum (Geraniaceae) in Turkey. PhytoKeys 75: 153-162, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.75.11011, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.75.11011
